channel.title: How to add explock and expunlock

item.title: How to add explock and expunlock
item.dc:creator: @bloodmaniet bloodmaniet
item.description:
@bloodmaniet wrote:

guys… ive added this so far…

public class client extends Player implements Runnable { public boolean explock = false;

also the command… (changed the one before didnt work but i added a little more… but this was from another post… doesnt work… =\

if (command.startsWith("explock")){ explock = true; sM ("you have turned on explock"); } if (command.startsWith("expunlock")){ explock = false; sM ("you have turned off explock"); }

I would really like some help… tell me correctly what i need to do. Thanks.

Read full topic
